event.description: Coco Crisp called out on strikes.
Cliff Pennington grounds out, pitcher Rodrigo Lopez to first baseman Bryan LaHair.
Josh Reddick grounds out, first baseman Bryan LaHair to pitcher Rodrigo Lopez.
Chris Carter pops out to shortstop Starlin Castro.
Brandon Allen grounds out softly, pitcher Rodrigo Lopez to first baseman Bryan LaHair.
Kurt Suzuki called out on strikes.
Pitcher Change: Carlos Marmol replaces Rodrigo Lopez.
Eric Sogard grounds out, first baseman Bryan LaHair to pitcher Carlos Marmol.
Collin Cowgill called out on strikes.
Wes Timmons flies out to left fielder Alfonso Soriano.
Pitcher Change: Jeff Beliveau replaces Carlos Marmol.
Coco Crisp walks.
Cliff Pennington walks. Coco Crisp to 2nd.
Josh Reddick singles on a line drive to center fielder Marlon Byrd. Coco Crisp scores. Cliff Pennington to 2nd.
Chris Carter walks. Cliff Pennington to 3rd. Josh Reddick to 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Dae-Eun Rhee replaces Jeff Beliveau.
Brandon Allen hits a grand slam (1) to right field. Cliff Pennington scores. Josh Reddick scores. Chris Carter scores.
Kurt Suzuki grounds out, second baseman Darwin Barney to first baseman Bryan LaHair.
Eric Sogard homers (1) on a fly ball to right field.
Collin Cowgill grounds out, third baseman Ian Stewart to first baseman Bryan LaHair.
Wes Timmons flies out to left fielder Alfonso Soriano.
Coco Crisp grounds out, second baseman Darwin Barney to pitcher Dae-Eun Rhee.
Cliff Pennington doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder David DeJesus.
Josh Reddick reaches on a fielder's choice out, shortstop Starlin Castro to third baseman Ian Stewart. Cliff Pennington out at 3rd.
Chris Carter singles on a ground ball to third baseman Ian Stewart. Josh Reddick to 2nd.
Brandon Allen doubles (1) on a fly ball to right fielder David DeJesus. Josh Reddick scores. Chris Carter scores.
Kurt Suzuki singles on a line drive to left fielder Alfonso Soriano. Brandon Allen to 3rd.
Pitcher Change: Trever Miller replaces Dae-Eun Rhee.
With Eric Sogard batting, passed ball by Welington Castillo, Brandon Allen scores. Kurt Suzuki to 2nd.
Eric Sogard flies out to right fielder David DeJesus.
Defensive Substitution: Jae-Hoon Ha replaces left fielder Alfonso Soriano, batting 1st, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Jonathan Mota replaces third baseman Ian Stewart, batting 2nd, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Junior Lake replaces shortstop Starlin Castro, batting 3rd, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Anthony Rizzo replaces first baseman Bryan LaHair, batting 4th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Brett Jackson replaces center fielder Marlon Byrd, batting 5th, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: James Adduci replaces right fielder David DeJesus, batting 6th, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Adrian Cardenas replaces second baseman Darwin Barney, batting 8th, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Micah Gibbs replaces catcher Welington Castillo, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Collin Cowgill flies out to center fielder Brett Jackson.
Wes Timmons grounds out to pitcher Trever Miller.
Coco Crisp reaches on throwing error by third baseman Jonathan Mota.
Cliff Pennington pops out to shortstop Junior Lake.
Dave Sappelt remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Rafael Dolis replaces Trever Miller.
Jason Pridie grounds out, pitcher Rafael Dolis to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Chris Carter pops out to second baseman Adrian Cardenas in foul territory.
Brandon Allen called out on strikes.
Pitcher Change: Lendy Castillo replaces Rafael Dolis.
Josh Donaldson walks.
Jeff Fiorentino singles on a ground ball to right fielder James Adduci. Josh Donaldson to 3rd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Brandon Moss replaces Collin Cowgill.
Brandon Moss grounds out to first baseman Anthony Rizzo. Josh Donaldson scores. Jeff Fiorentino to 2nd.
Wes Timmons flies out to center fielder Brett Jackson.
Landon Powell grounds out, shortstop Junior Lake to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Pitcher Change: Marcos Mateo replaces Lendy Castillo.
Josh Horton grounds out to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Jason Pridie walks.
Chris Carter doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Jae-Hoon Ha. Jason Pridie to 3rd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Cedric Hunter replaces Chris Carter.
Brandon Allen grounds out to first baseman Anthony Rizzo. Jason Pridie scores. Cedric Hunter to 3rd.
Josh Donaldson singles on a ground ball to shortstop Junior Lake. Cedric Hunter scores.
Jeff Fiorentino grounds out, first baseman Anthony Rizzo to pitcher Marcos Mateo.
Alfonso Soriano pops out to first baseman Brandon Allen.
Ian Stewart strikes out swinging.
Starlin Castro grounds out softly, pitcher Brandon McCarthy to first baseman Brandon Allen.
Bryan LaHair called out on strikes.
Marlon Byrd singles on a line drive to center fielder Coco Crisp.
With David DeJesus batting, Marlon Byrd steals (1) 2nd base.
David DeJesus walks.
Jeff Baker grounds into a force out, shortstop Cliff Pennington to second baseman Eric Sogard. Marlon Byrd to 3rd. David DeJesus out at 2nd. Jeff Baker to 1st.
Darwin Barney doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Collin Cowgill. Marlon Byrd scores. Jeff Baker scores.
With Welington Castillo batting, Darwin Barney steals (1) 3rd base.
Welington Castillo flies out to center fielder Coco Crisp.
Alfonso Soriano singles on a line drive to center fielder Coco Crisp.
Ian Stewart singles on a ground ball to center fielder Coco Crisp. Alfonso Soriano to 2nd.
Starlin Castro flies out to right fielder Josh Reddick.

Bryan LaHair grounds into a force out, second baseman Eric Sogard to shortstop Cliff Pennington. Alfonso Soriano scores. Ian Stewart out at 2nd. Bryan LaHair advances to 2nd, on throwing error by shortstop Cliff Pennington.
Marlon Byrd grounds out, third baseman Wes Timmons to first baseman Brandon Allen.
Pitcher Change: Andrew Carignan replaces Brandon McCarthy.
David DeJesus singles on a soft line drive to center fielder Coco Crisp.
Jeff Baker flies out to right fielder Josh Reddick.
With Darwin Barney batting, Kurt Suzuki picks off David DeJesus at 1st on throw to Brandon Allen.
Darwin Barney singles on a ground ball to center fielder Coco Crisp.
With Welington Castillo batting, Kurt Suzuki picks off Darwin Barney at 1st on throw to Brandon Allen.
Pitcher Change: Brian Fuentes replaces Andrew Carignan.
Welington Castillo homers (1) on a fly ball to left field.
Alfonso Soriano flies out to left fielder Collin Cowgill.
Ian Stewart grounds out to first baseman Brandon Allen.
Starlin Castro grounds out, shortstop Cliff Pennington to first baseman Brandon Allen.
Defensive Substitution: Jeff Fiorentino replaces second baseman Eric Sogard, batting 7th, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Josh Horton replaces shortstop Cliff Pennington, batting 2nd, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Jason Pridie replaces right fielder Josh Reddick, batting 3rd, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Landon Powell replaces center fielder Coco Crisp, batting 1st, playing catcher.
Defensive Substitution: Josh Donaldson replaces catcher Kurt Suzuki, batting 6th, playing third base.
Defensive switch from left field to center field for Collin Cowgill.
Defensive switch from third base to second base for Wes Timmons.
Pitcher Change: Edgar Gonzalez replaces Brian Fuentes.
Anthony Rizzo singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Jeff Fiorentino.
Brett Jackson walks. Anthony Rizzo to 2nd.
James Adduci singles on a line drive to left fielder Jeff Fiorentino. Anthony Rizzo to 3rd. Brett Jackson to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Dave Sappelt replaces Jeff Baker.
Dave Sappelt singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jeff Fiorentino, deflected by shortstop Josh Horton. Anthony Rizzo scores. Brett Jackson to 3rd. James Adduci to 2nd.
Adrian Cardenas triples (1) on a line drive to right fielder Jason Pridie. Brett Jackson scores. James Adduci scores. Dave Sappelt scores.
Micah Gibbs pops out to third baseman Josh Donaldson in foul territory.
Jae-Hoon Ha singles on a line drive to right fielder Jason Pridie. Adrian Cardenas scores.
Jonathan Mota strikes out swinging.
With Junior Lake batting, Jae-Hoon Ha caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Landon Powell to second baseman Wes Timmons.
Pitcher Change: Sean Doolittle replaces Edgar Gonzalez.
Junior Lake bunt pops out to third baseman Josh Donaldson in foul territory.
Anthony Rizzo walks.
Brett Jackson strikes out swinging.
James Adduci called out on strikes.
Defensive switch from left field to center field for Jeff Fiorentino.
Brandon Moss remains in the game as the left fielder.
Pitcher Change: Travis Schlichting replaces Sean Doolittle.
Dave Sappelt walks.
Adrian Cardenas grounds out to first baseman Brandon Allen. Dave Sappelt to 2nd.
Micah Gibbs flies out to left fielder Brandon Moss. Dave Sappelt to 3rd.
Jae-Hoon Ha singles on a ground ball to third baseman Josh Donaldson. Dave Sappelt scores. Jae-Hoon Ha advances to 2nd, on throwing error by third baseman Josh Donaldson.
Jonathan Mota flies out to right fielder Jason Pridie.
Cedric Hunter remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Junior Lake strikes out swinging.
Anthony Rizzo grounds out, first baseman Brandon Allen to second baseman Wes Timmons to pitcher Travis Schlichting.
Brett Jackson grounds out, pitcher Travis Schlichting to first baseman Brandon Allen.
